Tools

Collaboration diagram for Tools:

These are all BigWorld modules used only by the content creation tools. More...


Modules

 Application Manager
 Appmgr is used by the tools to manage application related issues such as input, initialisation, factories, scripts, and modules.
 Tool Gizmos
 This module contains the gizmo classes for manipulating objects in the content creation tools.
